## Data Import: CSV

Let's important data using the 'readr' package

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

```{r}
litters_df 
head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
view(litters_df)
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

`read_csv` options...

```{r}
read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("", "NA", 999, 88), skip = 2)
```
